Publius Cornelius Scipio, sent to Spain to hinder Hannibal, was out-man- oeuvred, and crossed to Italy to meet Hannibal as he came down from the Alps. He was defeated at the Ticinus, and again at the Trebia, where he fought under the pressure of his colleague.

Pu-blius Cornelius scipio Africanus, saved his father at the Ticinus, fought at Cannae : took command in Spain. Later he crossed to Africa and defeated Hannibal at Zama,202 13.c., and reduced Carthage: twice consul 3 died 183 13.c.
